abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33393998, pmid33284323, pmid33340409, pmid33284778, pmid33277353, pmid33393277, pmid33421967, pmid33355431, pmid33342437, pmid33387261, pmid33274530, pmid33411846, pmid33347322
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.01.12
